contest-event.event-date:
May 31, 1884 D Westleigh Contest
Westleigh Contest 0 Other
westleigh-contest
None
Set Test and Own Choice
The Heavens are Telling [unknown arranger]
Cricket Field, near Sovereign Pit, Leigh The contest was promoted by the Westleigh Brass Band, in aid of their instrument fund. It was anticipated that £12 to £15 would be raised towards this fund as a result of the contest.
The first prize was £12, second prize £6 10s third prize £3 10s and fourth prize £2.
Oct. 23, 2012, 9:21 p.m. Aug. 14, 2019, 7:28 p.m.
